sentence.Network_en: The councilor's proposal didn't succeed because his argument failed to carry conviction.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个议员的建议不受欢迎,因为他的论据没有说服力.

sentence.Network_en: Goebels rounded up a municipal councilor to perform the ceremony in the small conference room.
sentence.Network_cn: 戈培尔找来一位市议员在一间小会议室里主持了这一仪式.

sentence.Network_en: Councilor Weakling , who knew that this was probably true , made no further protest.
sentence.Network_cn: 威克林议员知道这是很可能的, 也就没有再提什么抗议.

sentences.en: The councilors put the problem of downtown parking before the mayor.
sentences.cn: 议员们向市长提出了市内停车的问题。

sentences.en: They collectively abstained (from voting) in the elections for local councilors.
sentences.cn: 他们在地方议会议员选举中集体弃权。
